channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023091093
item.description:
Report X-2023091093

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing one of four Sigma-Aldrich 34860-4L-R glass bottles to break. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing one of four Sigma-Aldrich 34860-4L-R glass bottles to break. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box crushed and torn while in transit causing two of four Nu-Calgon Nu-Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner 1 Gallon bottles to be crushed and crack. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box crushed and torn while in transit causing two of four Nu-Calgon Nu-Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner 1 Gallon bottles to be crushed and crack. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report E-2023100640
item.description:
Report E-2023100640

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: WESTAMPTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While moving a pallet of freight on the loading dock with a forklift the operator accidently hit another pallet of boxes that was staged on the dock with the pallet he was moving consequently slightly puncturing two boxes that were staged on the pallet contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was swept up and placed into a recovery container as were the two punctured boxes and shipped to the ultimate consignee without further incident.

item.title: Report X-2023081334
item.description:
Report X-2023081334

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-25T18:14:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: PARSIPPANY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: INSPECTED CONTENTS DUE TO OUTER BOX BEING SPECIFICATION PACKAGING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE 64 OUNCE PLASTIC BOTTLES OF TANK SAMPLES CONTAINING UNKNOWN SUBSTANCE. SDS OBTAINED FROM SHIPPER REVEALS SAMPLES CONTAIN A MIXTURE OF THREE REGULATED INGREDIENTS. SHIPPER IS UNKNOWN IF THE SAMPLES ARE REGULATED IN TRANSPORTATION IN THIS MIXED AND DILUTED STATE AND ARE GOING FOR TESTING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
